= Four Address Frame =

struct ieee80211_hdr_4addr {

	__le16 frame_ctl;

	__le16 duration_id;

	u8 addr1[ETH_ALEN];      // *next hop address*

	u8 addr2[ETH_ALEN];      // *tx interface address*

	u8 addr3[ETH_ALEN];      // *802.3 dst address*

	__le16 seq_ctl;

	u8 addr4[ETH_ALEN];      // *802.3 src address*

	u8 payload[0];
} __attribute__ ((packed));
